content: उपकंठ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Near, proximate. --ठः , --ठं {@--1@} Proximity, vicinity, neighbourhood; प्राप तालीवनश्याममुपकंठं महोदधेः <ls>R. 4. 34</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 48</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 51</ls>; <ls>Māl. 9. 2</ls>; आकृष्य चापं श्रवणोपकंठे <ls>Ś. 3. 5</ls> to the very ear. {@--2@} Space near a village or its boundary. {@--3@} One of a horse's paces. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Upon the neck, near the throat; प्रेम्णोपकंठं मुहुरंकभाजः <ls>Śi. 3. 36.</ls> {@--2@} In the vicinity of, near.
